Class SingletonMap

java.lang.Object

public class SingletonMap
extends java.lang.Object

Map with cached singleton beans.

Author:
Christian Ihle

Method Detail

addSingleton

public void addSingleton(Dependency description,
                         java.lang.Object singleton)
Adds a new singleton to the cache.

Parameters:
description - The description of the singleton.
singleton - The bean to add as as singleton.

getSingleton

public java.lang.Object getSingleton(Dependency singletonNeeded,
                                     boolean throwEx)
Gets a singleton from the cache.

Parameters:
singletonNeeded - The description of the singleton to get.
throwEx - If an exception should be thrown if no singleton was found.
Returns:
The singleton, or null, or IllegalArgumentException.

size

Returns the number of singletons in the cache.

Returns:
The number of singletons.

containsSingleton

Checks if a singleton exists in the cache.

Parameters:
description - The description of the singleton.
Returns:
If the singleton exists in the map.
